attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Enforce the law in order to save tax-payers money and stop local election candidates from using bogus information on their election nomination papers. It may sicken the  Law abiding Yorkshire People to know there are more cases of Electoral Fraud in 'God's Own County' than anywhere else in the country. Some candidates are known to be using bogus addresses and employment details, in order to become councillors!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
